text: Help! The flood is rising quickly in our area!
The typhoon has caused severe damage to infrastructure.
I'm worried about my family in the affected areas.
Earthquake just happened! Everyone stay calm and follow evacuation procedures.
Reports of landslides in mountain provinces after heavy rain.
I can't believe the volcano erupted with no warning!
We will rebuild stronger after this disaster. #PinoyResilience
Fire spreading in residential area, firefighters on the scene.
Everyone please stay indoors as the ash fall continues from the eruption.
The water level has receded, but damage is extensive.
